page.title: 18Children's Favourite Games 5
page.content: A game I enjoy is an intellectual spelling game called 'Scrabble'which can be played by two, three or four players. Each player picks up seven small plastic letters and then in turn each tries to make up words by putting them down on the board.Every letter has a value and the object of the game is to try and score as many points as possible by adding points won in each word.The board itself has various parts which allow the player to double the word score or treble the letter score. Players take it in turns to try and make words by using their letters as they use up their initial seven they replace them from the central store,until such time as they are all gone.Play continues until players have made all possible words then the final points total is found.
